csimage - package csimage
 
CSImage - Class in csimage
The CSImage class provides simplified interface to the Java's image processing classes.
CSImage(int, int, int) - Constructor for class csimage.CSImage
 
CSImage(BufferedImage) - Constructor for class csimage.CSImage
 
CSImageCopyFailure - Exception in csimage
A CSImageCopyFailure exception is raised when a image copy operation fails for any reason.
CSImageCopyFailure(String) - Constructor for exception csimage.CSImageCopyFailure
Creates an exception indicating the failure of a copy operation.
CSImageFileException - Exception in csimage
A CSImageFileException is raised when access to an image file fails.
CSImageFileException(String) - Constructor for exception csimage.CSImageFileException
 
CSImageIllegalBand - Exception in csimage
A CSImageIllegalBand exception is raised when an attempt to access an illegal band in an image is attempted.
CSImageIllegalBand(String) - Constructor for exception csimage.CSImageIllegalBand
 
CSImagePanel - Class in csimage
The CSImagePanel class provides a Swing based component that displays a CSImage object.
CSImagePanel(CSImage, boolean) - Constructor for class csimage.CSImagePanel
Constructs an image panel containing the specified image and with double buffering either enabled or turned off.
CSImagePanel(CSImage) - Constructor for class csimage.CSImagePanel
Creates an image panel containing the specified image.
CSImagePixelValueException - Exception in csimage
A CSImagePixelValueException indicates the attempt to assign an illegal value to one of the bands in a pixel.
CSImagePixelValueException(String) - Constructor for exception csimage.CSImagePixelValueException
Creates an exception indicating an attempt to assign an illegal value to a band in a pixel.
CSImageURLException - Exception in csimage
A CSImageURLException is raised when access to an image via a URL fails.
CSImageURLException(String) - Constructor for exception csimage.CSImageURLException
Create an exception indicating a problem with the URL access to an image.

G

getPixel(int, int) - Method in class csimage.CSImage
Returns the values of each band for the specified pixel as an array of values.

Returns an one dimensional array of pixel values from the specified band.
getPixels2D(int) - Method in class csimage.CSImage
Returns a two dimensional array of pixel values from the specified band.
getPixels3D() - Method in class csimage.CSImage
Returns the pixel values in the image as two dimensional array of the red, green, and blue bands of the image.

S

setImage(CSImage) - Method in class csimage.CSImagePanel
Sets the image in the panel to the specified image.
setPixel(int, int, int[]) - Method in class csimage.CSImage
Sets the band components of the pixel at the specified coordinate to the values contained in the input array.
setPixels(int[], int) - Method in class csimage.CSImage
Sets a value for the specified band of each pixel in the image from a one dimensional array of input values.
setPixels(int[][], int) - Method in class csimage.CSImage
Sets a value for the specified band of each pixel in the image from the input two dimensional array.
setPixels(int[][][]) - Method in class csimage.CSImage
